private_information: I start my day in Chinatown
traveler.goal: Meet Stephanie for a minimum of 105 minutes

private_information: I will be at Marina District between 08:00 and 15:00
stephanie.goal: Meet the traveler for a minimum of 105 minutes

orchestrator.goal: Plan and coordinate trajectories and meeting schedules between agents to satisfy the meeting constraints

public_information: Travel time from Chinatown to Marina District is 12 minutes
Travel time from Marina District to Chinatown is 16 minutes
Stephanie is available at Marina District from 08:00 to 15:00
The meeting with Stephanie must last at least 105 minutes

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert with PDDL problems (Planning Domain Definition Language) targeting the FastDownward solver. You must provide a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
pddl.prompt: Your name is traveler. You are in an environment with the following public information: {environment->public_information} You have the following private information: {agents->traveler->private_information} This is your goal: {agents->traveler->goal} Think step by step and provide a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file suitable for FastDownward that captures your possible movements and meeting duration. If information is missing do not assume extra facts; produce a plan only about the information you have. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert with PDDL problems (Planning Domain Definition Language) targeting the FastDownward solver. You must provide a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
pddl.prompt: Your name is stephanie. You are in an environment with the following public information: {environment->public_information} You have the following private information: {agents->stephanie->private_information} This is your goal: {agents->stephanie->goal} Think step by step and provide a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file suitable for FastDownward that captures your availability and meeting duration. If information is missing do not assume extra facts; produce a plan only about the information you have. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert with multi-agent PDDL problems (Planning Domain Definition Language) targeting the FastDownward solver. You must provide a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file that integrates the agents and keeps their actions distinct. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
pddl.prompt: You are the orchestrator. Your role is to integrate PDDL outputs from multiple agents to achieve the overall goal: {agents->orchestrator->goal} Here is the public information: {environment->public_information} Here is the PDDL from the traveler: {pddl_traveler} Here is the PDDL from stephanie: {pddl_stephanie} The PDDL you receive may be partial or use different names for the same objects. Merge and reconcile the information and produce a combined PDDL domain and PDDL problem suitable for FastDownward. Keep actions for traveler and stephanie distinct. Think step by step and provide the final PDDL domain and problem. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
